node.name: Men's Wallet MAKE: TITAN
node.description: At childhood our elder’s favour on us while giving their old wallet and we often carry our coins on them and showed up at local store like elders.
node.content: Ever since we saw our father paying from his wallet for our nasty request, we all desire to have precious wallet. At childhood our elder’s favour on us while giving their old wallet and we often carry our coins on them and showed up at local store like elders. It is very much necessary item for men while going outside like for ladies their handbag is. Small but valuable and resourceful gift that can carry all our father documents like pan card, Aadhar card, driving license and debit card or credit card as well. With two compartments the entire wallet is made with leather which can be polished at time it gets dull. Trusted brand as per quality and decent shade and shape which match with any trouser or jeans colour. Gift like this for dad will always get remember by him and mostly we saw that our fathers don't replace their wallet when they get old.

node.name: Sheesham Wood Rocking Chair MAKE: RJKART
node.description: It’s just a human behaviour that with growing age we sit at single place for long time and mostly that places are "Veranda".
node.content: Every child wants comfort for his parents and maybe that’s why we use to buy those products which are flexible enough to match parent’s requirements while whatsoever the prize would be. It’s just a human behaviour that with growing age we sit at single place for long time and mostly that places are "Veranda". This rocking chair is a perfect solution which has lean height and cosy cushions to comfort the body for long time. Parents & especially our fathers recommend for durable things that’s why this rocking chair is made with solid wood and polished with water proofing coats. Sponge cushions remain in shape for more than 5 years and can up thrust weight of 100 Kg which is good. Gifting the rocking chair will be remembered as warm love of son or daughter for father and remain in use for long years.
node.alt: RjKart Solid Sheesham Wood Rocking Chair With Cushions
